name: Uwais Hasan

testament.name: Will Writing Application
testament.des: An application that allows you to write your will with great security and ease, with many features that you choose to select the methods of writing the will. You can rely on friends' voting in terms of number or choose specific friends, and you can also make your will available to everyone.
future: You can log in or register
You can update all privacy information
There are many options and methods to write your will
The application supports two languages, Arabic and English
Ease of use and navigation within the application
Users can view the interaction and visibility of the voters
There is a dedicated page to teach the user how to use the website
howUse: clone this project or download on your device

socialmedia.name: Social Media Application (Wateen)
socialmedia.des: An application that allows you to write your will with great security and ease, with many features that you choose to select the methods of writing the will. You can rely on friends' voting in terms of number or choose specific friends, and you can also make your will available to everyone.
future: Login Panel
You can create posts or take pictures using the camera
You can comment, like, and reply to comments
You can follow people
You can edit personal information
There is a site-specific messenger and you can make video calls or regular calls
You can save posts
You can search for friends
howUse: clone this project or download on your device
